powergrid.model.interaction

Class TreeNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.model.interaction.TreeNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransportNetwork

    public class TreeNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransportNetwork
    This class represents a network of Transportables where the Transportables and the links between them act as a tree.

    This network type is preferred when the layout is like a tree, since the findPath method runs in O(n) and uses less memory than most pathfinding algorithms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TreeNetwork(Transportable rootElement)
      Creates a new TreeNetwork with the given element as root.

      Returns whether the Tree contains the given element.
      java.util.List<Transportable> findPath(Transportable source, Transportable destination)
      Computes a path between the given source and destination by nagivating upwards through the Tree until the source and destination share a common parent.
      TreeNode<Transportable> getRoot()
      Returns the root TreeNode of this TreeNetwork
      boolean makeConnection(Transportable parent, Transportable child)
      Creates a connections between two transportables, adding the child to the parent's child nodes.
      boolean remove(Transportable element)
      Removes the specified element from this Tree
      int size()
      Returns the amount of Nodes in the Tree.

    • Method Detail

      • makeConnection

        public boolean makeConnection(Transportable parent,
                     Transportable child)
        Creates a connections between two transportables, adding the child to the parent's child nodes.

        This possibly overwrites an existing parent-child relation, since TreeNodes can only have one parent.

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent Transportable
        child - the child Transportable
        Returns:
        whether the operation was succesful.

        this TreeNetwork's root

      • findPath

        public java.util.List<Transportable> findPath(Transportable source,
                                     Transportable destination)
        Computes a path between the given source and destination by nagivating upwards through the Tree until the source and destination share a common parent.

        This method runs in O(n) (where n = size()).

        Specified by:
        findPath in interface TransportNetwork
        Parameters:
        source - the starting point
        destination - the end point
        Returns:
        the path through the tree between source and destination
